X-Yahoo-Profile: alternate_dph

I got an idea for a new difficulty level: Ragnork (spelling?, you know
what word I'm looking for).  This would be ultimate hardest difficulty
level ever possible.

What would happen?  All characters on the opponent's side would be
reborn and come back with a higher experience level.  Something like
Every character who is below experience level 20 comes back with a 20%
higher experience level (minimum jump forward is, obviously, 1) and
those with experience level 20 or higher come back with a 10% higher
experience level.  I'm not sure what the terms for leaving that kind
of scenario: if you can manage to get to the exit when all your
opponents are destroyed or after you beat each character a set number
of times.

Any thoughts?
